org.jruyi.io

Interface IShortCodec

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGetShortDecoder, IPrependShortEncoder, IReadShortDecoder, ISetShortEncoder, IWriteShortEncoder

    public interface IShortCodec
extends IReadShortDecoder, IGetShortDecoder, IWriteShortEncoder, ISetShortEncoder, IPrependShortEncoder
    A short codec used to encode/decode short value to/from a chain of buffer units.
    See Also:
